title: Horrifying Antisemitic Attacks Plague America | 5/24/21
description:
Frustrated parents let a teachers union president know just how much the unions are dropping the ball. Are gender transition surgeries ethical? "60 Minutes" interviewed a woman who detransitioned. Glenn breaks down why the American Medical Association’s support for critical race theory is dangerous. Antisemitism reminiscent of the 1930s is on the rise in America, and nobody is covering it. Glenn proclaims that he will stand by the Jewish people. Dr. Fauci finally admitted he isn’t sure that COVID-19 “developed naturally” as more evidence mounts that the Wuhan biolab leak “conspiracy theory” may be true. Glenn compares military ads from Russia and the U.S. and warns of danger if our military continues going woke.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
